<blueprint>
Service VolumeConverter {
  description: "Converts volumes between different units",
  
  methods: {
    litersToMilliliters(liters: decimal) -> decimal {
      preconditions: [liters is valid volume value],
      postconditions: [returns accurate milliliter conversion],

    }
  }
}

Type Volume {
  value: decimal,
  unit: VolumeUnit
}

Type VolumeUnit {
  enum: ["liters", "milliliters", "cubic_meters", "gallons", "quarts", "cups", "fluid_ounces"]
}

Operation LitersToMillilitersConversion {
  input: {value: 2.5, unit: "liters"},
  conversionFactor: 1000,
  result: {value: 2500.0, unit: "milliliters"},
  operation: "volume conversion"
}

Validation VolumeLimits {
  liters: {min: 0, max: 1000000},
  milliliters: {min: 0, max: 1000000000}
}
</blueprint>
